name: SQL
description: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system (RDBMS)
column6:
or for stream processing in a relational data stream management system (RDSMS).

  • Transact-SQL is Microsoft's and Sybase's proprietary extension to the SQL used to interact with relational databases.
  • PL/SQL (Procedural Language for SQL) is Oracle Corporation's procedural extension for SQL and the Oracle relational database.

name: TypeScript
